attributes.action: Stop RMG (Residential Management Gp) from ripping off homeowners with charges.
attributes.additional_details: Hugely inflated prices rvery 6 months. Minimal service, no customer service and arrogant snd rude.
attributes.background: RMG are conducting un necessary maintenance of properties they manage or they do not conduct maintenancd at all and still charge for these services.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Residential Management Group are a private company and the UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for their decisions.
